Alternate Contact: Brianne Swetlishoff, Project Coordinator; Phone: 250.864.1436; Email: fresheventdesignkelowna@gmail.com
Service Details: - Focuses on grassroots educational initiatives for children with African partners- Established eleven community Literacy Centers in Uganda and South Sudan for children to access books and computers- Operates a project called Teaching Together, which sends one or two teams of teachers and child care professionals to Uganda annually for collaboration and teacher training- Partners with Niteo for various projects and fundraising efforts- Partners with First Lutheran Church Global Missions for the Eva Ruf Resource Centre which is a multi-use facility in Ntinda district, Kampala, Uganda that serves as a lending library for educators in and around Kampala, a safe and secure study area for local students, and a supervised recreation area for families and youth- Collects books locally that would otherwise be recycled and distributes them to families in challenging circumstances- Promotes literacy locally and globally
